required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Barley Green in Patients With Hyperuricemia
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Barley Green in Patients With Hyperuricemia

lead_sponsor.agency: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

collaborator.agency: First Affiliated Hospital of Wenzhou Medical University
Beijing Shijitan Hospital, Capital Medical University

clinical_study.source: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

brief_summary.textblock: This experiment evaluates the effect of Barley Green in patients with hyperuricemia ， and explores the effect of Barley Green on metabolic indexes such as uric acid, blood lipids, blood glucose, free fatty acids。130 adult participants , age 18 to 65 years, will be randomized into one of the two arms. Arm A (control group) will receive dietary guidance. Arm B will receive dietary guidance and Barley Green.

intervention.description: Barely Green（three times a day, 5g(10 tablets)） dietary advice for Hyperuricemia as Group A

facility.name: The Second Affiliated Hospital, Zhejiang University School of Medicine
The first affiliated hospital of Wenzhou medical university
